_header: On early morning the daylight springeth
_description: Four couplets on the Harrowing of Hell, paraphrasing the hymn Aurora lucis rutilat

OxfMert248.First Lines:
An ernemorwe de day liȝt spryngeþþe Angles in heuene
                    murþe syngeþ…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…Helle dore he brak wiþ his fot& out of pyne vs
                    wreches he tok
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 53.
Silverstein,  Theodore,
                        ed.  
             Medieval English Lyrics.
         York Medieval Texts. London: Edw. Arnold, 1971: 56-7.
